title: A recirculation system for concentrating CO2 electrolyzer products
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2292-2298
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01506H, Paper
Tobias A. Kistler, Rajiv Ramanujam Prabhakar, Peter Agbo
Ethylene concentrations from electrochemical carbon dioxide reduction are increased 20-fold by using a recirculation system with a hydrogen pump.
